entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trail
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with freezing rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
